entries.name: new(io, digests)
entries.desc: Creates a new DigestIO instance.  Using ::wrap is recommended, see the ::wrap documentation for documentation of io and digests.

entries.name: wrap(io, digests)
entries.desc: Wraps io and updates digest for each of the digest algorithms in the digests Hash.  Returns the digests hash.  Example:

entries.name: write(data)
entries.desc: Writes data to the underlying IO and updates the digests
